thread.title: Consumers Energy, road crews ready for winter storm
thread.title_full: Consumers Energy, road crews ready for winter storm

author: WOOD Grand Rapids
title: Consumers Energy, road crews ready for winter storm
text: Consumers Energy and area road crews say they're prepared to tackle issues caused by the winter storm that is rolling through West Michigan on Friday and Saturday. (Jan. 12, 2024) Consumers Energy and area road crews say they're prepared to tackle issues caused by the winter storm that is rolling through West Michigan on Friday and Saturday. NASA and Lockheed Martin have finally taken the wraps off of the X-59, a "quiet supersonic" aircraft that may shape the future of both military and civilian air travel. The X-59 has been under development at Lockheed Martin Skunk Works for years, following a $248 million grant from NASA in 2018. Until now the aircraft has only been seen in various stages of disassembly in the hangar; today marks the first time it's been out on the tarmac in public view, and of course they made quite a to-do over at Lockheed's Palmdale facility.
